mapper.insert: insert into study (studyname, studystart, period, recruitend, personnel,skillstack,position,connection,onoff,content,state,viewcnt,regDate,createdBy) values (#{studyname}, #{studystart},#{period},#{recruitend},#{personnel},#{skillstack},#{position},#{connection},#{onoff},#{content},'apply',0,now(),#{createdBy})
mapper.update: update study set studyname = #{studyname}, studystart = #{studystart},period = #{period},recruitend = #{recruitend},personnel = #{personnel},skillstack = #{skillstack}, position = #{position},connection = #{connection},onoff = #{onoff},content = #{content}, modifyDate = #{modifyDate},modifiedBy = #{modifiedBy}) where id=#{id}
update study set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where id=#{id}
